long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Abre Focus Extension is a browser extension for accessing an Abre Focus code. Upon entering a code, users will be able to utilize up to 8 pre-defined links set by the code creator. All other web traffic will be filtered or blocked based on permission settings configured within the Abre Platform. This feature enables teachers to establish a secure online environment for their students, fostering a distraction-free learning space.
